Module_Description: The app module is used communicate between hub and app
SubModule_Description: The sound module is used play sounds in the SPIKE App

Function.Function_Signature: set_attributes(volume: int, pitch: int, pan: int) -> None

Parameters.Argument_Description: The pan effect determines which speaker is emitting the sound, with "-100" being only the      left speaker, "0" being normal, and "100" being only the right speaker.
